issue.title: Gazebo for two launch files cannot simultaneously run? [gazebo-1 error]

content.raw: Hi @ahumay , this type of question is better suited for http://answers.gazebosim.org ; this issue tracker is for bug reports and feature requests. I see you already asked [the same question](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/21941/gazebo-for-two-launch-files-cannot-simultaneously-run-gazebo-1-error/) there, so I'm going to close this. Please don't duplicate questions in different places in the future.
